Summary
document.c
Functions
document_newCreate a new document with type
document_loadLoad a document (flow, line or project) from its filename, handling errors
document_load_pathLoad a document from its path, handling errors
document_saveSave document using its filename field at data directory.
document_assembly_filenameCreates a filename for a document
document_get_pathPrefix filename with data diretory path
document_deleteDelete document with filename from data directory.

Functions

document_new

GeoXmlDocument * document_new(enum GEOXML_DOCUMENT_TYPE type)

Create a new document with type

Create a new document in the user’s data diretory with type and set its filename.

document_load

GeoXmlDocument * document_load(const gchar *filename)

Load a document (flow, line or project) from its filename, handling errors

document_load_path

GeoXmlDocument * document_load_path(const gchar *path)

Load a document from its path, handling errors

document_save

void document_save(GeoXmlDocument *document)

Save document using its filename field at data directory.

document_assembly_filename

GString * document_assembly_filename(const gchar *extension)

Creates a filename for a document

Creates a filename for a document using the current date and a random generated string and extension, ensuring that it is unique in user’s data directory.

document_get_path

GString * document_get_path(const gchar *filename)

Prefix filename with data diretory path

document_delete

void document_delete(const gchar *filename)

Delete document with filename from data directory.
